channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: Coronavirus patient in ICU, first such case in Singapore in more than 2 weeks
item.description:
August 04, 2020 12:43 AM

Monday's ICU case is one of the 115 coronavirus patients who are still in hospital. Another 5,730 patients are recuperating in community facilities.
